security: Release delayed until death of subject.
summary: This document is an identification form for a CIA record related to the JFK assassination, specifically a 201 file of a protectable source, with release postponed until the subject's death.
summary_one_paragraph: This JFK Assassination System Identification Form pertains to a CIA record (104-10176-10073) concerning a protectable source's 201 file, classified as SECRET. The document, consisting of 341 pages, is categorized under the JFK record series with the agency file number 80T01357A. As of its last review on May 22, 1998, its release is postponed in full until the death of the subject, as indicated by the comment JFK64-12:F4A 1998.05.22.08:03:47:560082.
title: 201 FILE OF PROTECTABLE SOURCE.
